attributes.action: Calling for Captain Tom Moore to be #SirTomMoore by his 100th birthday.
attributes.additional_details: For demonstrating Great British spirit, humility and appreciation for all and raising £12M+ for the #NHS during this time of #Covid19 crisis. The true spirit of #TeamGB.
attributes.background: Ensure he gets Knighted within 2 weeks

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
